divest(IFractionalReserve.FractionalRese.details: Some wei are left over in the ERC4626 after rounding, so a full divest will yield less than expected and could fail Re-investing recovers the lost wei, it is not skimmable via realize interest

Divest capital from a fractional reserve vault when not enough funds are held in reserve
